item.title: Help with a COMPILING ERROR
item.dc:creator: @notmyscape notmyscape
item.description:
@notmyscape wrote:

the code used is

case 57: // Use item on npc fix by billysmither //int NPCID = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].npcType; //public int GetNPCID(int coordX, int coordY) { //for (int i = 0; i < server.npcHandler.maxNPCs; i++) { //if (server.npcHandler.npcs[i] != null) { //if (server.npcHandler.npcs[i].absX == coordX && server.npcHandler.npcs[i].absY == coordY) { //return server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType;} } } return 1; } int useItemID = inStream.readUnsignedWord(); int readone = inStream.readUnsignedWordA(); int readtwo = inStream.readUnsignedWordA(); int readthree = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian(); int readfour = inStream.readUnsignedWordA(); System.out.println("1 = "+readone); System.out.println("2 = "+readtwo); System.out.println("3 = "+readthree); System.out.println("4 = "+readfour); if(useItemID == 1855 && npcId == 1552) { sendMessage("You attack santa and hit him in the face with the rock,"); sendMessage("add he gets pissed, he yells at u, and calls u a ----head"); sendMessage("and now u hunted santa!"); hunt(); } break;
Help plz…
apparently, this line

			int useItemID = inStream.readUnsignedWord();

has been used already… but idk wtf i should do about it lol
which is 99% from Billysmither, not me. I just changed words.

Read full topic
